title: SVG colors confused in SkiaSharp.Svg 1.60.0
body:
SkiaSharp.Svg 1.60.0 gets colors confused, with text color sometimes taken from the colors of other elements. 1.59.1 is OK.

[SVGColors.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/files/2053503/SVGColors.zip)

Should look like:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19760720/40714152-b64be24c-63f9-11e8-955a-ddb32101566e.png)

But looks like this in 1.60.0, as some text color is taken from other white text:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19760720/40714265-11f9a548-63fa-11e8-9e5f-87b975177c91.png)

Tested using SkiaSharp / SkiaSharp.Views.Forms 1.60.0 and 1.60.1
